洑字的基本解释

洑
fú
水流回旋的样子。
漩涡。

洑
fù
游泳：洑水。

洑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》房六切，入屋，奉。］
亦作“汱2”。
(1)漩涡。
(2)水伏流地下。
洑2［fù］
浮游。

洑字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　洑； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页620第04
【廣韻】【集韻】?房六切，音伏。洄流也。一曰伏流。【杜甫詩】洑流何處入。　又水泊之名。【范成大·吳船錄】有魯家洑，長風洑。【集韻】與澓同。

["Guangyun" room six cuts, enter the room, bong. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　洑; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 620 04
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? The room has six cuts, and the sound is down. Flowing also. One said Fuliu. [Poems of Du Fu] Where does the flow enter?　It's also the name of Shuibo. [Fan Chengda·Wu Chuanlu] There are Lu Jiafu, Changfeng Fu. 【Jiyun】Same as Lun.
